name: Gear Aid Tenacious Tape Gear Patches
description: Field repairs don’t have to be ugly. These strong, grippy patches have a variety of outdoor motifs to add a personal touch to your mended sleeping pads, jackets or tents.For use on fabrics, outdoor gear, backpacks, luggage, cell phones, lunch boxes, windows and most surfaces.Leaves no sticky residue if removed.Includes two 7.62 x 25.4cm strips with various outdoor themes and shapes.
